changelog: Fix attachments again

Note that this is still beta

Moved DM commands to slash commands

Bug Fixes:
Fix advancement spam, mod now checks if advancement is complete
Fix several crashes if setup isn't done properly, showing error in log instead
Fix attachments and embeds

Fix crash on load
Rework config commands
READ CURSEFORGE CHANGELOG BEFORE UPDATING!
Multiple bugfixes

New Features:
Platform-Independent Addon Loader
Geyser Floodgate support (standalone spigot only, not working with bungee!)
Streaming status

Bug Fixes:
Fix Crash with forge
Fix wrong output in list command
Fix multiple possible crash-situations
Fix some placeholders not being replaced

Bug Fixes:
Fix Crash with forge

New Features:
Dynmap Integration for Forge

Bug Fixes:
Fix Server started message before server was done starting on Spigot

Bug Fixes:
Fix command log channel in DiscordSRV migration

New Features:
ID mentions (<@userid>) from ingame are now visible as name mentions (@SomeUser) after sending
Moved another hardcoded String into config file

Bug Fixes:
Fixed plugin.yml version numbering
Fixed some hover and click events not working on spigot
Fix possible error or crash when not linked
Fix ping sound not working on Forge

New Features:
Command log can be filtered to exclude commands

Bug Fixes:
Fix advancements not working in spigot
Fix default advancement message in config



Note: This is an alpha version which may contain multiple bugs

Ported to spigot (jar works on both forge and spigot)


New Features:
Added in-game reaction notifications and ping/mention sound (@Player or @Discord#1234 (if linked) from discord will play sound to target)
Moved more hardcoded strings into the localization config section (This also moves many options around which resets them)
(Spigot) Added Votifier integration
(Spigot) Added config migration from DiscordSRV (Just replace the jar and it should work)
(Spigot) Added Dynmap integration (Forge will follow soon)

Bug Fixes:
Fix bot-channel only commands working everywhere
Fix user and role pings not working



Note: This is an alpha version which may contain multiple bugs

Add workaround for memory leak with newlines
Fix caching
Add config option for player avatar url

Fixed non-webhook mode crash
[Config Change] Changed Admin role ID to Admin role IDs (array) to support multiple roles

FINALLY fixed mod shutdown delay
Fixed mod not loading in newer forge versions
Updated dependencies
Done some code cleanup and rewriting
Added webhook caching

NOTE: Update will use new config file!
To migrate, you can use this default configuration file: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/ErdbeerbaerLP/2b8e4ad30c14bc2941e0f7de63bcaf62/raw/Discord-Integration.toml (save it as Discord-Integration.toml)

Fixed mod not loading in newer forge versions
Updated dependencies

Fixed mod not loading in newer forge versions, Now using mixin provided by forge itself.
Added config option to require an space at the end of the command prefix
Removed channel description feature
Fixed clients seeing, that they are missing an mod
Fixed player avatars not working

Fixed crash without emojicord
Fixed avatar URL not working
Moved around the link configs. THIS WILL RESET THE "allow-linking" CONFIG VALUE!
Added link role (you get it in discord when linking to minecraft)
More configurable messages
Fixed server crash when linked player joins
Fixed linked player name not being used in some messages (join/leave/...)

Added config option to ignore /say messages starting with an specific prefix
Added full Emojicord integration (required emotes enabled on client and emojicord on installed server!)
Fix possible crashes with update checker and fix forgetting to increment version number :/
Fixed formatting issues with command, advancement and maybe more messages

Added update checker
Added small event handler
Fix ingame /discord command to show the invite message again
Removed seconds from default uptime format because of rate limits
Fix disabling item tooltips
Fixed disabling shutdown message
Emotes now no longer show thier ID but only the name
